title: The Gate of Lake Forest
description: Edited by Magnolia BelleEnter a World of Elfin Romance. Forbidden Love, different Worlds-Within the quiet forests of Colorado is a hidden world or at least it has been hidden from this small town for fifty thousand years...until now.When Michael Cole of Green Mountain Falls, Colorado falls inlove with Evelyn he embarks on a journey which will change both of them forever and while their love is forbidden and darkness ensues around them, they will fight to the end to stay alive and stay together!
author: Ami Blackwelder
